profile:
Granstone is an Ottawa-based leading provider of custom kitchen, basement and  bathroom renovations as well as fabricators and installers of stone countertops.  
We can do anything you require from full custom cabinets, flooring, backsplash, and countertops.   We have also recently added an electrical division with certified master electricians on staff.
Whatever your renovation needs we can help you do it! We have a wide selection of granite and natural stone countertops. 
Granstone employees approach each and every one of their projects as if it were their own. We strive to create a professional environment for our customers in order to ensure that every experience is a positive one. 

Should you have at any point in time some questions, please do not hesitate to contact our knowledgeable staff:
-via phone (613-733-0391)  
-email (info@granstone.ca), 
or best come visit us at our Ottawa showroom located at 17 Enterprise Ave Unit I.
www.granstone.ca

profile: Apartment Turnovers specializes in renovations, repairs, and property management.  We take great pride in our work as well as in customer satisfaction.  Our services apply to homeowners, investors/landlords, and commercial properties.  We offer packaged rates for multiple projects, as well as for management contracts that include maintenance, repairs, or renovations.  Our staff are experienced and knowledgeable in the entirety of the real estate industry, partnering with realtors, investors, contractors, etc.  We look forward to cultivating an on-going long term relationship with you.
name: Apartment Turnovers Inc
